title: NIMHANS Notification 2026 - Apply Offline for Project Research Scientist II Posts
description: The National Institute of Mental Health and Neuro Sciences (NIMHANS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Project Research Scientist II Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech, M.Sc can apply for the NIMHANS Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the educat...
